any type of process that you want
whether you want to optimize the

the leading to the protein that has the

you take the best performing mutant and

um Traverse this vast um sequence

uh physical descriptors of energy

Fitness so you start with um some

confirmational sampling or uh mutation

this score function um and you can
iterate this and so you can do this for
Designing enzymes as well um and the way

activity is through um you know this
score function and the thought is that
lower energy um systems are more likely

sorts of
constraints that you couldn't
